task.title: Update an Address in Student Record

prereq.p: Ensure that you have an active account in MyPack portal and logged into it before proceeding with the task

context.p: NC State University requires all students to update any changes to their addresses in the MyPack portal student information system
The following types of addresses can be added or edited in the student record:

step.cmd: Select Addresses from the left-hand navigation menu
Select the address box under the appropriate header
Update the address fields as necessary
